private class Dependency.DynamicProxyFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.reflect.InvocationHandler

Creates java dynamic proxy object for proxied scalar dependencies.

Method Detail

getProxy

public java.lang.Object getProxy(java.lang.Class spec)
Creates a proxy object for the given specification. The proxy uses the given dependency to get the service object.

Parameters:
spec - the service specification (interface)
Returns:
the proxy object.

public java.lang.Object invoke(java.lang.Object proxy,
                               java.lang.reflect.Method method,
                               java.lang.Object[] args)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
Invocation Handler delegating invocation on the service object.
